_header: A little child there is I-bore / I-sprung out of Jesses more
_description: A Christmas carol — five quatrains, aaab, including refrain, ‘Gloria tibi Domine’, and burden (bb): ‘Gloria tibi Domine / qui es natus de virgine’

BodAsh1393.First Lines:
A litil child þer is iboreysprong owt of Iesses
                    more…
BodAsh1393.Last Lines:
…[ ] sette we down vpon owre knee[ ] pray þat child
                    þat is so fre[ ] with gode herte now sing weGloria tibi
                        domine
